page.title: 12STRACHANS SCHOOL CLEANER
page.content: Mrs T. was a pupil in 1934/35/36.She {still has her silver dux medal}she won before going on to Banchory school. Then there were 2 teachers but 80 pupils.{They brought their peats}for the open fireplaces.In a wooden kit- chen{cocoa}was made in the summer and {potato or hare soup in the winter. Her 4 children all went to school here when there were 3 teachers(the east room was divided).Forestry work after the '53 gale caused the extra numbers. {She became cleaner in 1963}when her last child went to school.The school now had a boiler in the west classroom for central heating.(still does) She {also helped the headmasters wife serve {school meals.}She says the school is {messier now}with more equipment and projects.She{retires this year}and is buying her council house.
